title: Monitor your balena device fleet with Datadog
text: If you’ve already got your fleet up and running on balenaCloud and have been looking for a way to monitor each of your devices, this could be the project for you! We’ve created a demo project that runs the Datadog agent, allowing you to collect metrics about your hardware. You can integrate our example project with your existing setup to start capturing information about CPU utilization, disk, and network usage, temperature etc. immediately.

title: Valentines gift idea
text: Looking for a Valentine’s Day gift for your partner or significant other? How about a digital photo powered by balenaDash and Google Slides that you can both update with photos of your time together? There’s still time to build our project in time for the 14th!
